languages.text: {n}Инквизитор задумчиво поднимает бровь.{/n} "Ваше рвение впечатляет, {name}. Однако я не могу принять вашу присягу, по крайней мере не сейчас. Вы будете полезнее Инквизиции в текущем статусе, нежели в статусе члена моей свиты. Тем не менее..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваше рвение впечатляет меня, {name}. Однако я не могу принять вашу присягу. Не сейчас. Вы будете в разы полезнее Инквизиции, сохранив свой текущий статус нежели став одним из ее непосредственных агентов. Тем не менее..."

languages.text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор задумчиво поднимает бровь.{/n} "Ваше рвение впечатляет, {name}. Однако я не могу принять вашу присягу, по крайней мере не сейчас. Вы будете полезнее Инквизиции в текущем статусе, нежели в статусе члена моей свиты. Тем не менее..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

languages.text: {n}大审判官扬起眉毛，考虑着你的发言。{/n}“你的热忱给我留下了深刻的印象，{name}。然而，我不能接受你的誓言，至少现在还不能。比起加入我们的行列，你目前的身份会为审判庭发挥更大的作用。不过，尽管如此……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长扬起眉毛，考虑着你的发言。{/n}“你的热忱给我留下了深刻的印象，{name}。然而，我不能接受你的誓言，至少现在还不能。比起加入我们的行列，你目前的身份会为审判庭发挥更大的作用。不过，尽管如此……”

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor arquea una ceja y medita tus palabras.{/n} «Su fervor es impresionante, {name}. Sin embargo, no puedo aceptar ese juramento. Por lo menos, no en este momento. Será más útil para la Inquisición en su cargo actual que como miembro de mi grupo. Pero, a pesar de eso...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor arquea una ceja y medita tus palabras.{/n} «Su fervor es impresionante, {name}. Sin embargo, no puedo aceptar ese juramento. Por lo menos, no en este momento. Será más útil para la Inquisición en su cargo actual que como miembro de mi grupo. Pero, a pesar de eso...».

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは片眉をつり上げてこちらの申し入れを検討する。{/n}「見上げた熱意よ、{name}。しかしながら、お前の誓いは受け入れられぬ。少なくとも、今はふさわしくない。お前は我が一団のメンバーとして動くより、今の立場でいる方が異端審問庁の役に立つだろう。とは言え…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは片眉をつり上げてこちらの申し入れを検討する。{/n}「見上げた熱意よ、{name}。しかしながら、お前の誓いは受け入れられぬ。少なくとも、今はふさわしくない。お前は我が一団のメンバーとして動くより、今の立場でいる方が異端審問庁の役に立つだろう。とは言え…」

languages.text: {n}Der Großinquisitor hebt eine Augenbraue und erwägt deine Erklärung.{/n} "Euer Eifer ist beeindruckend, {name}. Allerdings kann ich einen solchen Schwur von Euch nicht akzeptieren, zumindest nicht jetzt. In Eurer aktuellen Position seid Ihr der Inquisition nützlicher als als Mitglied meiner Koterie. Dennoch ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Großinquisitor hebt eine Augenbraue und erwägt deine Erklärung.{/n} "Euer Eifer ist beeindruckend, {name}. Allerdings kann ich einen solchen Schwur von Euch nicht akzeptieren, zumindest nicht jetzt. In Eurer aktuellen Position seid Ihr der Inquisition nützlicher als als Mitglied meiner Koterie. Dennoch ..."

languages.text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur hausse un sourcil en réfléchissant à vos paroles.{/n} « Vous faites preuve d'un zèle surprenant, {name}. Je ne peux cependant pas accepter de serment de fidélité de votre part. Du moins, pas pour le moment. Vous serez plus utile à l'Inquisition à votre poste actuel qu'en tant que membre de ma suite. Néanmoins... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur hausse un sourcil en réfléchissant à vos paroles.{/n} « Vous faites preuve d'un zèle surprenant, {name}. Je ne peux cependant pas accepter de serment de fidélité de votre part. Du moins, pas pour le moment. Vous serez plus utile à l'Inquisition à votre poste actuel qu'en tant que membre de ma suite. Néanmoins... »

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, tek kaşını kaldırarak beyanını değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Adanmışlığın etkileyici {name} ancak senin bu yeminini kabul edemem, en azından şimdilik. Engizisyon için şu anki mevkinde, benim heyetimde olacağından daha faydalı olursun."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor raises one brow, considering your declaration.{/n} "Your zeal is impressive, {name}. However, I cannot accept such an oath from you, at least, not now. You will be more useful to the Inquisition in your current position than as a member of my coterie. Nevertheless..."
